info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Teton, west central Chouteau and north central Cascade Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 328 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Eagle, or near Great Falls, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Black Eagle, Portage and Malmstrom Air Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm has a history of producing accumulating hail. If travelling, be prepared for rapid changes in road conditions. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
